attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the unicyclist comunity would wish that the incredible skills and devotion to our art would be recognised as a new olympic sport for 2012. We already have peolple waving strings and playing with balls: unicycling is highly skilled and compepetive and is more difficult than volleyball

rejection.details: The International Olympic Committee decide which sports feature in the Olympics. It is outside the remit of the PM and Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
